Supermen u odelu Klarka Kenta
Niste valjda zaboravili Dvajta Hauarda?

06 Nov 2019

Tek je sedam utakmica prošlo, rano je za neke konačne zaključke, ali navijače Los Anđeles Lejkersa može da raduje to što su Jezeraši prvi put još od novembra 2010. tim sa najboljim učinkom u NBA lige. Nakon što su u prvom kolu izgubili gradski derbi sa Klipersima vezali su Lejkersi šest pobeda i postalo je svakome jasno da ne može tek tako da otpiše tim sa Lebronom Džejmsom i Entonijem Dejvisom.
Međutim, ovih dana se u “Gradu anđela“ još više priča o još jednom asu. Istina, pomalo zaboravljenom, otpisanom, “bivšem“... Dvajt Hauard se vratio na velika vrata.
Nije to doduše isti onaj igrač sa vrhunca karijere, zver koja je protivnice bacala po terenu dok je u proseku beležila više od 20 poena i skoro pa 15 skokova po utakmicu. Davno je to bilo. Mnogo se toga promenilo otkako je Hauard 2014. kao igrač Hjustona poslednji put bio član ol-star tima. Svake sezone očekivanja da će se vratiti i svake sezone mali korak unazad. Ili bar stagnacija. U razmaku od samo 26 meseci šetali su Hauarda od Atlante, preko Šarlota, Bruklina, Vašingtona, Memfisa, sve do Los Anđelesa. Za Bruklin i Memfis nije stigao ni da debituje. Prošle sezone je u dresu Vašingtona izdržao samo devet utakmica.
Ubile su ga povrede. I kao da se Hauardova karijera pretvorila u iščekivanje njegovog odlaska u penziju. Rame, koleno, pa mišići gluteusa. Popularni Supermen kao da je igrao sa komadom kriptonita u džepu.
Ovog leta se pak kolo sreće okrenulo. Muka je prešla na Demarkusa Kazinsa, koji je Hauardu dao više minuta no što je bilo planirano. A 33-godišnji centar ih je oberučke dočekao. Pored Džejmsa i Dejvisa, pa čak ni šuteree kakvi su Grin, Kuk ili Bredli, nije prva napadačka opcija kao svojevremeno u Orlandu, nije više ni tako okretan i ekspozivan. Ali je zreliji, mudriji, koristan na neki drugi način.



Odbrana i skok. To su sada Hauardova zaduženja. I sjajno ih obavlja. Za nešto više od 21 minuta na terenu u proseku beleži 7,9 skokova i 6,7 poena. Da ne zaboravimo i 2,1 rampu po meču što ga svrstava među 10 najboljih blokera u ligi. Supermen je zbacio plašt i navukao odelo Klarka Kenta. Više ne leti kroz zgrade, ali završava posao.
Recimo, dok je Hauard na terenu čuveni +/- Lejkersa je 71 što je drugio najbolji učinak u ligi odmah iza Lebronovih 75! Nije to naravno toliko zbog Dvajtovih koševa, već zato što protivnici, izračunao je Yahoo Sports, u proseku šutiraju 13,6 odstoi gore kad je Hauard ispred njih. I ono što je najimpresivnije, kad neko promaši Hauard uhvati neverovatnih 20,2 odsto lopti! Otprilike svaka peta ja njegova, a računamo sve igrače na parketu. Napred, nazad, nije bitno – njegova je!“Igramo dobro, a svaki put kad pogrešimo Supermen je tu da skoči", rekao je Kralj Džejms posle jedne utakmice.
Napadački, naravno, nije to idealno, štaviše, nikad Hauard nije ubacivao manje, ali kao što rekosmo to mu više i nije osnovno zaduženje. A pride, to malo poena što ubacuje radi savršeno efikasno. Procenat šuta za dva poena mu je 78,6 odsto (22/28) što ga čini najsigurnim u celoj NBA ligi! Protiv Čikaga baš su Hauardovi poeni bili ključni.“Nije više eksplozivan kao kad je bio mlađi, ali bolje razume košarku. On je jedan od najpametnijih igrača koje sam trenirao. Ima savršenu komunikaciju sa igračima i perfektno se prilagođava okolnostima“, hvali i Sten Van Gandi, koji mu je bio trener u Orlandu.
Supermen u odelu i kravati. Radi posao.
(FOTO: Reuters)
text:
Superman in Clark Kent's suit
Didn't you forget Dwight Howard?

06 Nov 2019

With only seven games gone, it's too early to reach any definitive conclusions, but Los Angeles Lakers fans can look forward to being the Jezerash for the first time since November 2010, the best performing team in the NBA. After losing the City Derby to the Clippers in the first round, they tied the Lakers with six wins and it became clear to everyone that they couldn't just write off a team with Lebron James and Anthony Davis.
However, there is more talk of another ace these days in the City of Angels. True, somewhat forgotten, written off, "ex" ... Dwight Howard returned to the big door.
It is not, however, the same player at the height of his career, a beast that threw opponents down the field while averaging over 20 points and nearly 15 rebounds per game. It was a long time ago. Much has changed since Howard was a member of the ol-star team in 2014 as a Houston player. Each season, the expectation that he will return and each season a small step back. Or at least stagnation. In a span of just 26 months, they walked Howard from Atlanta, across Charlotte, Brooklyn, Washington, Memphis, all the way to Los Angeles. He didn't even make his debut for Brooklyn and Memphis. Last season he only lasted nine games in a Washington jersey.
He was killed by his injuries. And it was as if Howard's career had turned to the anticipation of his retirement. Shoulder, knee, then gluteus muscle. The popular Superman seemed to be playing with a piece of kryptonite in his pocket.
This summer, however, the wheel of fortune has turned. The torment passed to Demarkus Kazins, who gave Howard more minutes than planned. And the 33-year-old mall welcomed them. Aside from James and Davis, not even a shooter like Green, Cook or Bradley, it's not the first offensive option like Orlando at the time, it's no longer so agile and exponential. But it is more mature, wiser, useful otherwise.



Defense and jump. These are Howard's duties now. And it does a great job. In just over 21 minutes, he averaged 7.9 rebounds and 6.7 points. Not to forget the 2.1 ramp per match, which makes him one of the top 10 blockers in the league. Superman ripped off his cloak and put on Clark Kent's suit. He no longer flies through buildings, but gets the job done.
For example, while Howard is on the field, the famous +/- Lakers are 71 which is the second best performance in the league just behind Lebron's 75! Of course, this is not so much because of Dwight's points, but because opponents, Yahoo Sports calculated, shoot an average of 13.6 percent worse when Howard is ahead of them. And what's most impressive, when someone misses Howard, he catches a whopping 20.2 percent of the ball! About every fifth of his, and we count all the players on the floor. Forward, backwards, it doesn't matter - it's his! "We play well, and every time we make a mistake Superman is there to jump," King James said after one game.
Offensively, of course, this is not ideal, moreover, Howard has never scored less, but as we have said, this is no longer his primary responsibility. And then, that little point that he inserts works perfectly efficiently. His two-point shot percentage is 78.6 percent (22/28), making him the safest in the entire NBA league! Against Chicago, Howard's points were crucial. ”He's not as explosive as he was when he was younger, but he understands basketball better. He is one of the smartest players I have coached. He has perfect communication with the players and is perfectly suited to the circumstances, ”praises Stan Van Gandhi, who coached him in Orlando.
Superman in a suit and tie. He's doing the job.
(PHOTO: Reuters)
